titleStmt.title: F. L. Yager et al. to Unknown
CWG7478

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: We the undersigned whose names are herein to assigned feel desireous that Lewes Smith shall be released from the government indictment that now stands against him

F L Yager
J H Booker
W. F. Lucas
W C Sams
P N. Teak
T S Force
F Hayden
Ben Hayden
J. O. Anderson
J. W. Vauter
J. B. Browne
Wm M Violett
Lewis Boyer
David Luckett
G M Jons
Robt Long
Robt Thomas
Joseph Long
Anthony Thomas
S F Thomas
J W Clark
F V. Thomas
J B Thomas
Jno. V. Smith
W A Smith Jr
R. S. Gillock
R P Smith
John Heckell
Jas Singleton
Jesse Cravens
George Terril
Perry Arnold
C W Arnold
Rob. Arnold
H, M. Gossom
A D Caplinger
M Horton
L Horton
T Horton
